Header: Kilinochchi Troops Put Up Bicycle Shed for Students
Content: Army troops of the 573 Brigade of the 57 Division under the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi gave their maximum cooperation for erection of a metal shed (20’ x 60’) for bicycle parking in Kilinochchi Dharmapuram Central College. It was vested in school students on Wednesday (12) during a simple ceremony. One Officer and 20 Soldiers with the support of 40 school students completed the above task under the supervision of Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, General Officer Commanding, 57 Division.
